wikipedia_page.main: Francis Hamilton Mellor  (13 May 1854 – 26 April 1925), known as Frank Mellor, was an English judge and a cricketer who played in first-class cricket matches for Cambridge University, Kent and the Marylebone Cricket Club between 1874 and 1878. He was born in Bloomsbury, London and died in Paris, France.

response: * Frank Mellor (1854–1925), English lawyer and cricketer
